snippet: Donald Trump has waged almost continual warfare against his critics. The result: more people are paying attention to the president than ever....

headline.main: Daimler to Recall One Million Mercedes Globally After 51 Fires
headline.print_headline: Daimler to Recall One Million Mercedes Globally After 51 Fires

lead_paragraph: Donald Trump has waged almost continual warfare against his critics. The result: more people are paying attention to the president than ever.
